text: [Music]

towards data door checks and a bunch of
other random things

that do model training versus

just in general infrastructure and

everything else feels like this extra
stuff they need to do so that's where I

cluster deploying the job against it and
specifically for scenarios like
distributed training like those are even
kind of even more of a pain because
people need to come in they need to
create several machines SSH into it make
sure that they can talk to each other I
think at this point somewhat of a it
would not maybe not entirely a soft
problem but certainly like 10x better
than we were like a couple years ago
